name: ARPB_TX_TEST_INFO
description: This table stores the test results for the professional billing procedures.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: HEMATOCRIT_READING
columns.description: The hematocrit count of the procedure.  This is populated only if the blood related info of the procedure is hematocrit.

columns.name: HEMOGLOBIN_READING
columns.description: The hemoglobin count of the procedure.  This is populated only if the blood related info of the procedure is hemoglobin.
